Quick start tutorial¶

DALILA may be installed using standard Python tools (with administrative or sudo permissions on GNU-Linux platforms):

$ pip install dalila

or

$ conda install dalila

Installation from sources¶

If you like to manually install dalila you can clone our GitHub repository:

$ git clone https://github.com/slipguru/dalila.git

From here, you can follow the standard Python installation step:

$ python setup.py install

Examples¶
